Name: Everdine - A Lost Girl's Tale
About the game: Everdine - A Lost Girlâ€™s Tale is a short, atmospheric, fairy tale vibes RPG Maker horror adventure game. Everdine finds herself lost in a forest of eternal twilight. Soon to be hunted by a mysterious beast, she will stumble across the remnants of others that came before her, and learn of a magical ritual that may be her only way out. Gather the needed ingredients to complete the spell, and bring her home before the dangers of these woods devour poor Everdine. Features: A short, atmospheric game. Collect the needed items to escape an environment that tries to kill you. Progression through exploration, solving puzzles and overcoming other obstacles. Uncover the mysteries of the forest. A female protagonist. Inspired by folklore and fairy tales. Neither much gore, nor an overuse of jump scares. Multiple endings and death scenes. It's been called wholesome horror and eerie but cute before. Warnings: Flashing lights and images. Play with sound on (some scenes depend on sound).
